code: export var tipos=function tipos(type,array){if(array.length)return array.filter(function(p){return p.tipos.includes(type);});return[];};export var ordered=function ordered(order,array){var names=array.map(function(o){return o.name;});var fuerza=array.map(function(o){return o.fuerza;});var api=array.filter(function(e){return e.createdDBB!==true;});var bdd=array.filter(function(e){return e.createdDBB===true;});var orde=[];switch(order){case"a-z":names=names.sort();names.forEach(function(p){array.forEach(function(po){if(p===po.name)orde.push(po);});});return orde;case"z-a":names=names.sort().reverse();names.forEach(function(p){array.forEach(function(po){if(p===po.name)orde.push(po);});});return orde;case"ataque+":fuerza=fuerza.sort(function(a,b){return b-a;});fuerza.forEach(function(f){array.forEach(function(p){if(p.fuerza===f)orde.push(p);});});orde=orde.filter(function(e,i){return orde.indexOf(e)===i;});return orde;case"ataque-":fuerza=fuerza.sort(function(a,b){return a-b;});fuerza.forEach(function(f){array.forEach(function(p){if(p.fuerza===f)orde.push(p);});});orde=orde.filter(function(e,i){return orde.indexOf(e)===i;});return orde;case"createdBDD":return bdd;case"api":return api;default:return array;}};
